verses.verse: And I said, <S%H559><s%> Hear, <S%H8085><s%> I pray you, <S%H4994><s%> O heads <S%H7218><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and ye princes <S%H7101><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> Is it not <S%H3808><s%> for you to know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H853><s%> judgment? <S%H4941><s%>

Who hate <S%H8130><s%> the good, <S%H2896><s%> and love <S%H157><s%> the evil; <S%H7451><s%> who pluck off <S%H1497><s%> their skin <S%H5785><s%> from off <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> them, and their flesh <S%H7607><s%> from off <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> their bones; <S%H6106><s%>

Who <S%H834><s%> also eat <S%H398><s%> the flesh <S%H7607><s%> of my people, <S%H5971><s%> and flay <S%H6584><s%> their skin <S%H5785><s%> from off <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> them; and they break <S%H6476><s%> their bones, <S%H6106><s%> and chop them in pieces, <S%H6566><s%> as <S%H834><s%> for the pot, <S%H5518><s%> and as flesh <S%H1320><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> the caldron. <S%H7037><s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> shall they cry <S%H2199><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> but he will not <S%H3808><s%> hear <S%H6030><s%> them: he will even hide <S%H5641><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> them at that <S%H1931><s%> time, <S%H6256><s%> as <S%H834><s%> they have behaved themselves ill <S%H7489><s%> in their doings. <S%H4611><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> the prophets <S%H5030><s%> that make <S%H853><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> err, <S%H8582><s%> that bite <S%H5391><s%> with their teeth, <S%H8127><s%> and cry, <S%H7121><s%> Peace; <S%H7965><s%> and he that <S%H834><s%> putteth <S%H5414><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> into <S%H5921><s%> their mouths, <S%H6310><s%> they even prepare <S%H6942><s%> war <S%H4421><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> him.

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> night <S%H3915><s%> shall be unto you, that ye shall not have a vision; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2377><s%> and it shall be dark <S%H2821><s%> unto you, that ye shall not divine; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7080><s%> and the sun <S%H8121><s%> shall go down <S%H935><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the prophets, <S%H5030><s%> and the day <S%H3117><s%> shall be dark <S%H6937><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> them.

Then shall the seers <S%H2374><s%> be ashamed, <S%H954><s%> and the diviners <S%H7080><s%> confounded: <S%H2659><s%> yea, they shall all <S%H3605><s%> cover <S%H5844><s%> <S%H5921><s%> their lips; <S%H8222><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> there is no <S%H369><s%> answer <S%H4617><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%>

But truly <S%H199><s%> I <S%H595><s%> am full <S%H4390><s%> of power <S%H3581><s%> by <S%H854><s%> the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and of judgment, <S%H4941><s%> and of might, <S%H1369><s%> to declare <S%H5046><s%> unto Jacob <S%H3290><s%> his transgression, <S%H6588><s%> and to Israel <S%H3478><s%> his sin. <S%H2403><s%>

Hear <S%H8085><s%> this, <S%H2063><s%> I pray you, <S%H4994><s%> ye heads <S%H7218><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and princes <S%H7101><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that abhor <S%H8581><s%> judgment, <S%H4941><s%> and pervert <S%H6140><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> equity. <S%H3477><s%>
They build up <S%H1129><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%> with blood, <S%H1818><s%> and Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> with iniquity. <S%H5766><s%>

The heads <S%H7218><s%> thereof judge <S%H8199><s%> for reward, <S%H7810><s%> and the priests <S%H3548><s%> thereof teach <S%H3384><s%> for hire, <S%H4242><s%> and the prophets <S%H5030><s%> thereof divine <S%H7080><s%> for money: <S%H3701><s%> yet will they lean <S%H8172><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and say, <S%H559><s%> Is not <S%H3808><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> us? none <S%H3808><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> can come <S%H935><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> us.

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> shall Zion <S%H6726><s%> for your sake <S%H1558><s%> be plowed <S%H2790><s%> as a field, <S%H7704><s%> and Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> shall become <S%H1961><s%> heaps, <S%H5856><s%> and the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> as the high places <S%H1116><s%> of the forest. <S%H3293><s%>
